Name: Attica
Description: A region that includes Athens, the capital city of Greece.

Name: Central Greece
Description: A region in the central part of mainland Greece.

Name: Central Macedonia
Description: A region located in the northern part of Greece.

Name: Crete
Description: The largest Greek island, known for its ancient history and beautiful landscapes.

Name: East Macedonia and Thrace
Description: A region located in the northeastern part of Greece, bordering Bulgaria and Turkey.

Name: Epirus
Description: A region in the northwestern part of Greece, known for its mountains and villages.

Name: Ionian Islands
Description: A group of islands located in the Ionian Sea, west of mainland Greece.

Name: North Aegean
Description: A group of islands in the northern part of the Aegean Sea.

Name: Peloponnese
Description: A peninsula in southern Greece known for its archaeological sites.

Name: South Aegean
Description: A group of islands in the southern Aegean Sea, including the Cyclades and Dodecanese.

Name: Sterea Hellas
Description: A central region of Greece, also known as Central Greece, bordering Attica and the Peloponnese.

Name: Thessaly
Description: A region located in central Greece, known for its plains and Mount Olympus.

Name: Western Greece
Description: A region in the western part of mainland Greece, known for its beaches and natural landscapes.

Name: Western Macedonia
Description: A region in the northwestern part of Greece, known for its mountainous terrain.
